definition: Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong
Ama-no-hashidate in the north of Kyōto prefecture 京都府 on the Sea of Japan

sentences.english: Crosswalks even got a fresh coat of paint to encourage walking and biking.
sentences.chinese: 過街天橋上都掛上鼓勵步行和騎車的條幅。

sentences.english: Does this bus take me to Tianqiao?
An overpass is being put up at the corner of the street.
sentences.chinese: 在那條街的拐角處正在建起一個過街天橋。

sentences.english: Appropriately, Maternity Bend follows Hospital Bridge. This too was named after a medical facility – Macau's Maternity Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 山頂醫院天橋之後是產房彎，以澳門的婦產醫院命名。
房屋入口處的天橋和階梯外觀。

sentences.english: A pedestrian way passage links up the footbridge across Siu Sai Wan Road.
sentences.chinese: 行人通道連接橫跨小西灣道的行人天橋。

sentences.english: There are also two supports and connections to receive future footbridges .
sentences.chinese: 亦有兩個支座及連接點接駁日後的行人天橋。

sentences.english: You may cross the street by the footbridge.
sentences.chinese: 你可以走過街天橋過馬路。

sentences.english: The steel pedestrian overcrossing is a kind of special structure.
sentences.chinese: 鋼結構人行天橋是一種特殊的結構形式。

sentences.english: Tianqiao is located in Xuanwu District, with the Temple of Heaven to its east.
sentences.chinese: 天橋位於城南的宣武區，東面就是天壇公園。

sentences.english: After you do, ahead of you, you'll see two pedestrian fly overs.
sentences.chinese: 之後在你的前方你會看到兩座過街天橋。

sentences.english: It is accessible from the public pedestrian footbridges at Castle Peak Road and On Shun Street.
sentences.chinese: 可由青山公路及安信街的公衆行人天橋前往。

sentences.english: Just down under the overline bridge.
Screen top painting is"the old Beijing overpass eight weird"rich Beijing characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 屏風上面畫的是“老北京天橋八怪”富有北京特色。

sentences.english: Link to two footbridges across Wo Tai Street and is accessible from Wo Tai Street.
sentences.chinese: 連接兩條橫跨和泰街的行人天橋，可由和泰街前往。

sentences.english: When we need to cross the street, we should always use the pedestrian crossings or pedestrian bridges.
sentences.chinese: 過馬路時，我們一定要走人行橫道或過街天橋。

definition: (used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
running in opposite direction (buses, trains, ferries etc)
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
